outputs.output_descr: The ONE UN Programme  is also the Delivering as One strategy for the UN system in the Kyrgyz Republic whereby the UN family is committed to strenthen the collaboration among its UN Organizations to increase coherence, effectiveness and impact of its developmental assistance. In a continual effort to improve aid effectiveness and timely support to the host Government, the UN system in Kyrgyzstan has designed a One UN Programme. One UN Programme is a framework for planning and response of the UN system to address the effects of energy and food insecurity and the global economic crisis on the most vulnerable in the country. The One UN Programme builds on the commitments of the current UN Development Assistance Framework.

project_descr: To advance the Kayrgyzstan's national development plans and move towards achieving the Millennium Development Goals, the UN family in partnership with the Government has united efforts within the framework of Delivering as One
